metadata.description: “THE BEST DEFENSE” PART TWO!  The Monarch of the Oceans has declared war once more on the surface world in the pages of AVENGERS. And if this is a war that Namor means to win, he is going to need allies to stand beside him! The Sub-Mariner’s quest for a lost tribe of sea-dwellers carries him further than he ever thought possible—and to a reckoning both strange and wonderful!  And hey, what’s up with that weird apparition in the sheet, anyway?
metadata.name: Namor: The Best Defense
